statements: DELETE FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Tech Solutions' AND platform_access = TRUE;
DELETE FROM communication WHERE sender_id = 5 AND receiver_id = 10;
DELETE FROM documents WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND document_name = 'Contract';
DELETE FROM communications WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND recipient_id IN (SELECT vendor_id FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Corp')
DELETE FROM communications WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND vendor_id = 'ab901234-5678-1234-1234-123456789012'
DELETE FROM documents WHERE vendor_id = 1 AND doc_name = 'Contract Agreement';
